snippet.title: Exzore: The Rising - Hero Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Exzore: The Rising

Hero Reveal Teaser

Play as Damien Clive as he emerges from the ashes to seek retribution and regain his honor. Equip mechanical gadgets that gives you special abilities and use them for your advantage during combat and exploration. Combine your Exzore abilities and weapon swings to punish your enemies in most devastating ways. Craft and modify your mechanical gadgets, weapons and armors to tailor your own combat style. Develop your character using the dynamic skill system to become a legendary warrior or a mighty guardian. Explore the vast open world - vanquishing foes, pulling through erratic weather, facing political conspiracies and uncovering ancestral secrets. All of this and more – brought to life with stunning visuals using Unreal Engine 4.

Website: http://www.exzoretherising.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/exzoretherising
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExzoreTheRising
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/artist/tinysharkinteractive
